mapper.insert: insert into car (carID, carType, carOrigin, route, carProDate, carBuyDate, COMMENT) values (#{carid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carorigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{route,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carprodate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carbuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update car set carType = #{cartype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carOrigin = #{carorigin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route = #{route,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carProDate = #{carprodate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carBuyDate = #{carbuydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where carID = #{carid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select carID, carType, carOrigin, route, carProDate, carBuyDate, COMMENT from car
